bwwExcerpt: Working with a smallish stage (and two or three main sets), designer Arnulfo Maldonado and video designer Hana S. Kim provide us with as much color as possible. As for the costumes, by Wilberth Gonzalez and Tony Award winner Paloma Young, they are sometimes super-colorful as well (in the fancy dresses designed by Estella) but also suitably workaday for a group of women without much financial means.
